*div1 type="summary"* *p*J. E. B. Austin to Austin, September 23, 1826. Constitution will exclude slavery, but slaves of the first colony will be safe. Legislature hostile. Bastrop's services to Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-23-1826">23. Sept 1826—*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*My Dr Brother:*/p*
*p*I arrived *date_mentioned n="09-22-1826">last evening */date_mentioned*after a fatigueing journey—I proceeded to visit the *person_mentioned*Baron */person_mentioned*immediately he is in good health—to day I have not been able to collect much interesting News for you—the mail starts this *date_mentioned n="09-23-1826">evening */date_mentioned*and it is now so late I shall not be able to write any thing satisfactorily until next post—The *person_mentioned*Slave */person_mentioned*question is undecided as yet. The *person_mentioned*Baron */person_mentioned*has done his best—but one opposed to so large a *person_mentioned*majority */person_mentioned*can do but little—*/p*
*p*He will lay before the *person_mentioned*house */person_mentioned*a bill, in a day or two for the benefit of the *person_mentioned*300 families */person_mentioned*and thinks there is no doubt but the *person_mentioned*slaves */person_mentioned* introduced by them will be held—he also states that he will never sign the Constitution if they persist in so unjust an imposition on the rights of the *person_mentioned*settlers*/person_mentioned*—it is the opinion of the *person_mentioned*Baron */person_mentioned*that a further introduction of *person_mentioned*slaves */person_mentioned*is out of the question—in another Legislature, a favourable *person_mentioned*Slave */person_mentioned*law might be procured, but the present one is composed of *person_mentioned*members */person_mentioned*so inimical to the interests of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, that the most that can be obtained is permission for the *person_mentioned*300 families */person_mentioned*to hold their *person_mentioned*Slaves*/person_mentioned*—The Constitution will not make its appearance before the *date_mentioned n="01-01-1827">1 of Jany*/date_mentioned*—The *person_mentioned*Baron */person_mentioned*is anxious to return—but at present he cannot—and in a short time the winter will set in; and his age and infirmaties will not permit him to travel—It is all important that the *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*should have a *person_mentioned*friend */person_mentioned*in the *person_mentioned*Legislature*/person_mentioned*—It is also of the greatest importance the *location_mentioned*Baron */location_mentioned*should return to conclude the business of the *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*but is impossible for him to do so until *date_mentioned n="03-xx-1827">March */date_mentioned*or *date_mentioned n="04-xx-1827">April*/date_mentioned*—I presume you heard of the confusion that has existed in the Legislature and which has caused more delay in the progress of the discussions of that body than any thing else—the substance of the whole is—the *person_mentioned*People */person_mentioned*had become disgusted with the proceedings— and demanded a new Election or the Constitution—Every thing is quiet at present—and the *person_mentioned*Legislature */person_mentioned*will probabl use more dispatch; since the *person_mentioned*People */person_mentioned*have manifested their feelings—You have no idea what trifles have engaged their attention for months in fact the whole body deserve to [be] turned out doors—The *person_mentioned*Baron */person_mentioned*says he wants money I have stated to him our situation etc—I have not seen *person_mentioned*Padilla */person_mentioned*yet altho I am writing in his *location_mentioned*house*/location_mentioned*—Next mail expect a Volume*/p*
*p*Remr me to *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*and other friends—*person_mentioned*E Bean*/person_mentioned* is here he has the comission of Col. and permission to settle the *location_mentioned*reserve on the Sabine */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Edwards Coly as far as the Nachez*/location_mentioned*. Yr B.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J B A*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] Al. *person_mentioned*Ciudadno Tente Corl Estevan F. Austin*/person_mentioned* en la Villa de *location_mentioned*Sn felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
